text: Iqbal Theba (pronounced ; born December 20, 1963) is a Pakistani-American actor. Theba is known for his role as Principal Figgins in the musical show Glee. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Karachi
title: Iqbal Theba
